main event: Several unidentified light objects were observed in the sky over Fort Smith, Arkansas on August 15, 1966.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing red, green, and white blinking lights moving in various directions,The lights were visible for several hours and were seen by hundreds of people, including police officers,The FAA reported no unusual air activity in the area,Some witnesses described the lights as brighter and larger than conventional aircraft lights,One witness likened the lights' movement to a flight with rapid direction changes, suggesting the possibility of being a high-powered craft.
sighted object: several blinking light objects in the sky
witness description: residents of Fort Smith and surrounding areas, including police officers
